name: acsd-assignment-4-tylermatzelle
description: This respository is intended for the use of Focus College Students enrolled in the Advanced Certificate of Software Development located in Kelowna, BC and Surrey, BC.

scripts.prestart:dev: npm run start && npm run build:compile
scripts.start:dev:notest: npm run build:compile && npm run start
scripts.build: npm run build:lint && npm run build:prettier && npm run build:compile
scripts.build:fix: npm run build:lint:fix && npm run build:prettier:fix && npm run build:compile
scripts.build:lint:compile:format: npm run build:lint && npm run build:prettier && npm run build:compile && npm run test && npm run start

author: Tyler Matzelle
